components.component:
org.jboss.seam.ui.Link org.jboss.seam.ui.Link org.jboss.seam.ui.component.html.HtmlLink org.jboss.seam.ui.component.UILink
A link that supports invocation of an action with control over conversation propagation. Does not submit the form.
org.jboss.seam.ui.LinkRenderer org/jboss/seam/ui/htmlLink.jspx
link org.jboss.seam.ui.taglib.LinkTag
org.ajax4jsf.framework.taglib.HtmlComponentTagBase
&ui_component_attributes; &ui_output_attributes; &html_anchor_attributes; &html_button_attributes; &html_universal_attributes; &html_events; &ui_command_attributes;
view java.lang.String the JSF view id to link to.
pageflow java.lang.String a pageflow definition to begin. (This is only useful when propagation="begin" or propagation="join".)
propagation java.lang.String determines the conversation propagation style: begin, join, nest, none or end. "default"
fragment java.lang.String the fragment identifier to link to.
outcome java.lang.String
disabled boolean
